Package hac.ex4.Beans

Class Cart

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.Beans.Cart
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Component public class Cart extends Object implements Serializable
We use this to save our beans and do all the actions of deleating saving and editing
